body_html:
Yes, this first program is an incorrect use of the API. Actually, we are currently in the progress of changing the Caffe2 API so that it is harder to make this mistake. But we will not fix this particular problem; instead, we will be evolving the Caffe2 API to resemble more the PyTorch C++ API.

I'm happy to leave this issue open for you until the loose edge is filed away, or feel free to close it if you think it is not relevant.

CC @jerryzh168

body:
Yes, this first program is an incorrect use of the API. Actually, we are currently in the progress of changing the Caffe2 API so that it is harder to make this mistake. But we will not fix this particular problem; instead, we will be evolving the Caffe2 API to resemble more the PyTorch C++ API.

I'm happy to leave this issue open for you until the loose edge is filed away, or feel free to close it if you think it is not relevant.

CC @jerryzh168
